title: Big data Analytics for Pre-Teacher Preparation of Higher Education in Thailand
abstract: Digital technology is really important in the present world for driving the national economy with the data-driven development at the age of big data. The arrival of the new Big Data Technology becomes an important instrument for driving organizations to be effective with higher competitive ability. Therefore, big data is popularly used in all industries as well as in graduate production of the universities for improving educational quality. In this paper, the focus is on big data for higher education by presenting big data analytics for producing pre-teacher of higher education in accordance with the need for pre-teacher preparation in Thailand framework.
venue: 2022 Research, Invention, and Innovation Congress: Innovative Electricals and Electronics (RI2C)

journal.name: 2022 Research, Invention, and Innovation Congress: Innovative Electricals and Electronics (RI2C)
